INSTRUCTIONS: This form is to be completed by the clinician or other trained health professional, based on subject response. For additional clarification and examples, see UDS Coding Guidebook for Initial Visit Packet, Form B6. Check only one answer per question.
Check this box and enter "88" below for the Total GDS Score if and only if the subject: 1.) does not attempt the GDS, or 2.) answers fewer than 12 questions.
